ygData.subject: RE: Fighting Without  A  Weapon (Becoming a real Bard)
ygData.msgSnippet: Weapons are also the best method when soloing high greens that run fast(at least at level 22 it is) As you have to stay on top of them to get chords or DDD to
ygData.messageBody:
Weapons are also the best method when soloing high greens that run fast(at
least at level 22 it is) As you have to stay on top of them to get chords or
DDD to wince them, and you may attract other things with the AOE songs

-----Original Message-----
From: Operaman [mailto:slider@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 9:27 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Fighting Without A Weapon (Becoming a real Bard)


From: "Operaman" <slider@...>

Congratulations, and welcome to the true bard community! =D

I agree, it is very satisfying using the all instrument attack. Win a duel
without even swinging a fist and revel in the stunned silence you'll be met
with, heheh. It's not always a feasible tactic, though. Weapons and bellow
are still the best way to solo a caster, I've found. At least in the low
20's.

Operaman Overtone
Meandering Maestro of the 20th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk

> Take it from me, if you have never fought a mob using your instrament
> instead of weapons, you are missing the true feeling of being a bard
> (IMHO). I dont know if I will ever pick up another weapon.
>
> Clukey Lyricweaver, Bristlebane, 22nd Song

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
